Translations.Text: Nos forbade eum ex accepting totus nursing mater! (His soror) tunc dictus ego show vos familia levabat eum vos take bonus care de eum
Sic nos restored eum his mater in order please eam remove eam injuria let eam know ut deus promise est truth! Autem multus de them non know
When he reached maturity strength nos endowed eum cum wisdom knowledge! Nos sic reward the righteous

Dodum he iniit oppidum unexpectedly sine recognized people He invenit 2 vir fighting unus est Hebrew ex his people alius est Egyptian his enemies. 1 ex his people alias on eum pro help his enemy Moses punched eum killing eum! He dictus Hoc est work devil he est real enemy profound misleader
He dictus My Dominus ego wronged my anima. Please forgive me He forgave eum! He est Forgiver Merciful
He dictus My Dominus in return pro Tuus blessings me ego nunquam est supporter guilty unus
In the morning he est oppidum afraid watchful. Unus sought his help heri asked his help again Moses dictus to eum Vos est really trouble faber
Ante he attempted strike their mutuus enemy he dictus O Moses vos want perfecit kill me prout vos killed alius vir heri? Obviously vos wish est tyrant terra; vos non wish est righteous
Vir advenit running alius side de oppidum dictus O Moses people est plotting kill vos! Vos bonus sinister statim! Ego dedit vos bonus advice
He fled oppidum afraid watchful. He dictus My Dominus save me ex oppressive people
Prout he traveled Midyan he dictus maius my Dominus guide me rectus path

When he reached Midyan's aqua he invenit crowd people aqua nota bene 2 femina waiting on the side He dictus Quod est it ut vos need They dictus Nos non est able to aqua crowd disperses noster patris est veteris vir
He aqua them tunc turned shade dictus My Dominus whatever provision vos send to me ego est in dire need pro it
Soon 1 de 2 femina approached eum shyly dictus My patris invites vos pay vos aqua nos. When he met eum told eum his story he dictus non Habet fear Vos saved oppressive people
de 2 femina dictus O my patris hire eum! He est bonus unus hire he est strong honest

He dictus Ego wish offer 1 de my 2 filia vos to maritus in return working me 8 pilgrimages si vos factus them 10 it est voluntary tuus part Ego non wish factus hoc matter too difficult pro vos. Vos invenit me DEUS testimentum righteous
He dictus It est agreement me vos. Whichever period ego fulfill vos non est averse to either 1. DEUS est guarantor DE quod NOS DICTUS
